means: 里昂(法国东部旧省) [亦作 Lyonais]

sentence.Network_en: Lyonnais cooking is epitomized by the so-called "bouchons".
sentence.Network_cn: 被称作bouchon的里昂小餐馆是里昂饮食的缩影。

sentence.Network_en: Credit lyonnais is in the banking business.
sentence.Network_cn: 里昂信贷银行从事金融业务.

sentence.Network_en: Olympique Lyonnais also bid strongly for you. Why did you choose Real Madrid?
sentence.Network_cn: XXXX(什么球队啊)也为你报出了很高的价格, 为什么你会选择皇家马德里?
